history.proof: unfold eqTerm, plusTerm. intros. hauto lq: on depth: 3.

exceptions.tactic: destruct Hxy; destruct Hptyy; simpl; auto.
exceptions.exn: The reference Hxy was not found in the current environment.

original: unfold eqTerm, plusTerm. intros x y Hxy Hptyy. destruct Hxy; destruct Hptyy; simpl; auto.
